snippet: But Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, Iran’s supreme leader, said nothing could stop his country from building nuclear weapons, should it choose to do so.
abstract: Iran’s supreme leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei says his country is not seeking nuclear weapons but adds that if Iran ever decided to build them, no 'global power' could stop it; rejects talks with the United States because of American-devised sanctions.
lead_paragraph: But Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, Iran’s supreme leader, said nothing could stop his country from building nuclear weapons, should it choose to do so.

headline.seo: Supreme Leader Says Iran Not Seeking Nuclear Arms
headline.main: Ayatollah Says Iran Will Control Nuclear Aims
headline.print_headline: Ayatollah Says Iran Will Control Nuclear Aims
